wnv module

West Nile Virus SEIR Model Class

Contains class for West Nile Virus disease model. Inherits from FitModel and Vector Borne Disease Model class.

Typical usage example:

wnv = WNVSEIRModel(<config_file_path>)

Class method param_dict allows you to change parameters values from configuration file inputs by inputting a dictionary of different parameter values

Typical usage example:

wnv_param_dict = WNVSEIRModel.param_dict(<config_file_path>, <parameter dictionary>)

class wnv.WNVSEIRModel(config_file, param_dict=None)

Bases: fit.FitModel

Models the spread of WNV.

Inherits from the FitModel class. Specifies ODE system of equations.

error_zero_constants()

check if human population is non-zero.

check if vector carrying capcity is non-zero.

error_zero_to_one_params()

check if parameters that should be in [0,1] are

model_func(t, y)

Defines system of ODEs for dengue model

Initial State Names:

Sv: Susceptible vector population.

Ev: Exposed vector population.

Iv: Infected vector population.

Nv: Vector population.

Sb: Susceptible bird population.

Eb: Exposed bird population.

Ib: Infected bird population.

Rb: Recovered bird population.

Nb: Bird population.

Ih: Infectious human population.

Parameters:

mu_v: Vector death rate.

mu_b: Bird death/recovery rate.

beta_b: Biting rate under frequency dependence.

alpha_v: Probability of virus transmission to vector, per infectious bite.

alpha_b: Probability of virus transmission to bird, per infectious bit.

psi_v: Vector birth rate.

K_v: Vector carrying capacity.

r_v: Vector growth rate.

lambda_v: vector force of infection.

lambda_b: Bird force of infection.

nu_v: Vector latent period.

nu_b: Bird latent period.

eta: Contact rate * probability of transmission to humans

classmethod param_dict(config_file, param_dict)

Inherit vbdm param_dict class method
